name: most-gestures
description: unified desktop/mobile high level pointer gestures, using most.js

scripts.release-patch: git checkout master && git pull origin master && npm t && npm version patch && git push origin master --tags
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master && git pull origin master && npm t && npm version minor && git push origin master --tags
scripts.release-major: git checkout master && git pull origin master && npm t && npm version major && git push origin master --tags

author: Mark 'kaosat-dev' Moissette
